sentences.sContent: Thomson was disqualified from the 400 metre freestyle.
sentences.sCn: 汤姆森被取消了400米自由泳的参赛资格。

remMethod.val: dis(不) + qualify(具有资格) → 使不具有资格 → 使丧失资格

words.tran: 不合格的；被取消资格的
不合格；取消资格；被罚下场
使不合格；取消…的资格（disqualify的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: When someone is disqualified, they are officially stopped from taking part in a particular event, activity, or competition, usually because they have done something wrong
